author: boudoul
body:
Greetings,
This PR is a simple proposal to remove the UP15 suffix from Workflows used in the phase1,phase2 relvals. This suffix was intended to be used for run2 WFs < 2017 and can generate confusion in the output names in the relval sample, like a recent one (2018 scenario) : 
/RelValNuGun_UP15/CMSSW_9_0_0_pre4-PU25ns_90X_upgrade2018_realistic_v4-v1/DQMIO

I let PdmV ( @fabozzi , maybe one should update the other L2 PdmV in the list ) comment, this is just a proposal ...
title: Removing UP15 suffix from Samples used for >=2017 WFs
